subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Svein Tuft turned his back on the world of cycling because of the sport’s doping problems. Now, he is a rider to watch in the Tour de France.
snippet: Svein Tuft turned his back on the world of cycling because of the sport’s doping problems. Now, he is a rider to watch in the Tour de France.
